A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If I had not grown up watching Star Wars Episodes 4\, 5 & 6\, I would have thought this movie was great. But I did watch the old movies\, and so this movie was not great. It was far from it. It took a character that I looked up to\, as a childhood hero\, and turned him into a joke/villain. This is hugely disappointing. They killed off Luke in this movie\, but to me\, he died back in '83 with Return of the Jedi. The man in this movie is not Luke Skywalker.
